mapper.select: SELECT aud.id, aud.user_oid 'userOID', aud.device_id 'deviceID', aud.vendor_type_id 'vendorTypeID', aud.platform_id 'platformID', aud.created_date 'createdDate', aud.os_version 'osVersion', aud.app_version 'appVersion', aud.pixel_ratio 'pixelRatio', aud.device_brand 'deviceBrand', aud.device_model 'deviceModel', aud.device_name 'deviceName', aud.remark 'remark', aud.status 'status', (SELECT MAX(aull.created_date) FROM art_user_login_log aull WHERE aull.device_id = aud.device_id) 'lastLoginDate' FROM art_user_device aud WHERE aud.user_oid = #{userOid} ORDER BY lastLoginDate DESC
